authors.name: jlanciego
authors.affiliation: Center for Applied Medical Research (Cima) University of Navarra

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ap17","text":"Here an step-by-step protocol is provided summarizing the immunoperoxidase detection of neurons expressing alpha-synuclein in the macaque brain. Enclosed image illustrates layer V pyramidal neurons showing immunoreactivity for alpha-synuclein at the level of the cerebral cortex (insular gyrus).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
ethics_statement: {"blocks":[{"key":"322g4","text":"Animal handling was conducted in accordance to the European Council Directive 2010/63/UE as well as in full keeping with the Spanish legislation (RD53/2013). The experimental design was approved by the Ethical Committee for Animal Testing of the University of Navarra (ref: CEEA095/21) as well as by the Department of Animal Welfare of the Government of Navarra (ref: 222E/2021)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

funders.funder_name: Aligning Science Across Parkinson's through the Michael J. Fox Foundation for Parkinson's Research

keywords: Immunoperoxidase, diaminobenzidine, ABC method, immunohistochemistry, brain

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.section: Immunoperoxidase protocol (all steps below are conducted in free-floating sections and at room temperature unless otherwise noted)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4l2p0","text":"Frozen coronal sections (40 microns-thick) to be obtained in a sliding microtome (Leica HM400) and collected in 0.125 M phosphate buffer (PB) pH 7.4 as 10 series of adjacent sections.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Immunoperoxidase protocol (all steps below are conducted in free-floating sections and at room temperature unless otherwise noted)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a8ut9","text":"Wash the sections three times (10 min each) in phosphate-buffered saline solution (PBS; 0.05M pH 7.4)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Immunoperoxidase protocol (all steps below are conducted in free-floating sections and at room temperature unless otherwise noted)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"edkvl","text":"Inactivate the endogenous peroxidase activity: incubation for 40 min in a solution made of 10 ml ethanol, 600 microliters of H2O and 133 microliters of H2O2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":126,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":153,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":155,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Immunoperoxidase protocol (all steps below are conducted in free-floating sections and at room temperature unless otherwise noted)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ed5mn","text":"Preincubation solution (60 min): 1% bovine serum albumin (BSA) + 0.05% triton X-100 + 0.05% gelatin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Immunoperoxidase protocol (all steps below are conducted in free-floating sections and at room temperature unless otherwise noted)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fpr2u","text":"Incubation with the primary antibody (overnight at 4 ÂºC). Mouse anti-alpha-synuclein (monoclonal), 1:40 in PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Immunoperoxidase protocol (all steps below are conducted in free-floating sections and at room temperature unless otherwise noted)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7p3po","text":"Wash the sections three times (10 min each) in PBS 0.05M pH 7.4","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Immunoperoxidase protocol (all steps below are conducted in free-floating sections and at room temperature unless otherwise noted)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4kvvp","text":"Incubation with the secondary antibody (120 min). Donkey anti.mouse (Biotin-SP), 1:600 in PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Immunoperoxidase protocol (all steps below are conducted in free-floating sections and at room temperature unless otherwise noted)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f10b8","text":"Wahs the sections three times (10 min each) in PBS 0.05M pH 7.4","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Immunoperoxidase protocol (all steps below are conducted in free-floating sections and at room temperature unless otherwise noted)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1fptl","text":"Incubation with ABC complex (90 min). ABC complex to be prepared 30 min prior to use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Immunoperoxidase protocol (all steps below are conducted in free-floating sections and at room temperature unless otherwise noted)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fg05j","text":"Wash the sections three times (10 min each) in PBS 0.05M pH 7.4","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Immunoperoxidase protocol (all steps below are conducted in free-floating sections and at room temperature unless otherwise noted)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1vurr","text":"Stain with the peroxidase chormogen diaminobenzidine (DAB; 3-5 min). Incubation solution made of 0.05% DAB and 0.01% H2O2 in PBS 0.05M pH 7.4","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":118,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":120,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Immunoperoxidase protocol (all steps below are conducted in free-floating sections and at room temperature unless otherwise noted)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"am7h5","text":"Wash the sections three times 810 min each) in PBS 0.05M pH 7.4","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Immunoperoxidase protocol (all steps below are conducted in free-floating sections and at room temperature unless otherwise noted)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e1dqt","text":"Mount free-floating sections in gelatin-coated slides and air-dry overnight.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Immunoperoxidase protocol (all steps below are conducted in free-floating sections and at room temperature unless otherwise noted)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fvo51","text":"Sections to be dehydrated and cleared in 100% toluene (2 x 10 min) and coverslipped with DePex.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
